reading.title: The Cow
reading.paragraph: The cow is a domestic animal. It gives us milk and eats grass. Cows are found in many countries around the world.

questions.question: What does the cow give us?

reading.title: The Moon
reading.paragraph: The moon is Earth's only natural satellite. It shines at night by reflecting the light of the sun. People have walked on the moon.

questions.question: Who has walked on the moon?

reading.title: The Library
reading.paragraph: A library is a place where people go to read or borrow books. It is usually very quiet. Many students go there to study.

questions.question: Why do students go to the library?
What can people do at the library?
What is the library usually like?
